title: How to pay for Rwandan nationality renunciation.
content_markdown:
#  How to pay for Rwandan nationality renunciation. 

Modified on: Fri, 23 May, 2025 at 4:28 PM

This service enables users to make payments for the application fee associated with the process of renouncing their nationality.

  

The service is provided by the Directorate General of Immigration and Emigration and its price is 150,000 Rwf.

  

Prerequisites: 

  * You cannot apply to this service while logged in.

  * An applicant should have an Identification document number

  * The applicant should have a valid phone number and an email address.

  * An applicant must have submitted their application of renunciation to the Directorate General of Immigration and Emigration and be allowed to start the payment process.

Follow these steps to pay for the Rwandan nationality renunciation.

  1. Visit [www.irembo.gov.rw](<http://www.irembo.gov.rw/>). Under Immigration And Emigration, click on Rwandan Nationality.

  3. Choose “Rwandan nationality renunciation payment”, and click on Apply. 

  4. Fill in the Applicant’s details, by clicking in the blank space to input the required details (*: means mandatory information) and click next to proceed.

4\. Verify that the information is true, enter a phone number and/or email address, check the verification box, and click on Submit.  

5\. A billing number/ID (88….) will be generated for payment, click Pay. 

6\. Applicants choose the mode of payment: offline (MTN, Airtel, or BK) or online (Visa, MasterCard, or American Express). For more information about payment modes, click [here](<https://support.irembo.gov.rw/en/support/solutions/articles/47001146862-how-to-pay-for-a-service>).

Note: After paying for your application, the applicant reaches out to the Directorate General of Immigration and Emigration for further instructions.
